verses.text: 務要傳道我在 神面前，並且在那將要審判活人死人的基督耶穌面前，憑著他的顯現和國度叮囑你：

words.note: Lit. 'transmit the Dao/Word'

verses.text: 務要傳道；無論時機是否適合，都要常作準備；要以多方的忍耐和教訓責備人、警戒人、勸勉人。

words.note: Lit. 'transmit the Dao/Word'

verses.text: 因為時候快要到了，人必容不下純正的道理，反而耳朵發癢，隨著自己的私慾，增添許多教師，
而且轉離不聽真理，反倒趨向無稽之談。

words.note: Lit. 'talk without basis'

verses.text: 你卻要凡事謹慎，忍受磨難、作傳福音者的工作，完成你的職務。

words.note: Lit. 'preacher of the good news'

verses.text: 我已經被澆奠；我離世的時候也到了。

words.note: Refers to a libation, an offering poured out.
A euphemism for death in religious contexts.

verses.text: 那美好的仗我已經打過了，當跑的路我已經跑盡了，所持的信仰我已經守住了。

words.note: Often used in '美好的仗' (good fight) in biblical context.
Refers to completing one's race or course.
Forms a passive construction 'that which is...'

verses.text: 從此以後，有公義的冠冕為我存留，就是按公義審判的主在那日要賞給我的；不但賞給我，也賞給所有愛慕他顯現的人。

words.note: Often used metaphorically for reward or honor in the Bible.
Refers to God or Jesus.
Refers to the return or revelation of Christ.

verses.text: 最後的吩咐你要盡快到我這裡來。
因為底馬貪愛現今的世界，就離棄我到帖撒羅尼迦去了。革勒士去了加拉太，提多去了達馬太。

words.note: Implies a selfish or excessive love for something.

verses.text: 只有路加在我這裡。你找到了馬可，就把他帶來，因為他在聖工上對我有益。
我差派了推基古到以弗所去。
我在特羅亞留在加布那裡的外衣，你來的時候要把它帶來，還有那些書卷，特別是那些羊皮卷，也要帶來。

words.note: Refers to ancient rolled manuscripts.
Refers to scrolls made from animal skin.

verses.text: 銅匠亞歷山大作了許多惡事陷害我，主必按著他所行的報應他。

words.note: A respectful title for God or Christ.
Indicates the object or agent of the following verb.
Often implies negative consequences, divine retribution.

verses.text: 你也要提防他，因為他極力抵擋我們的話。
我第一次申辯的時候，沒有一個人支持我，反而離棄我。但願這罪不要歸在他們身上。

words.note: Often used to express a strong wish or hope.
Combined with '不' forms a negative command or prohibition.
Refers to sin being laid upon someone.
Literally 'on the body', here used idiomatically for 'upon'.

verses.text: 然而主站在我旁邊，加給我力量，使福音的信息藉著我盡都傳開，萬國的人都可以聽見；他並且把我從獅子口中救出來。

words.note: Used as a title for God or Jesus.
Implies adding and bestowing.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Emphasizes totality.
Refers to all peoples or Gentiles.
Implies 'from within the mouth' or 'from the grip of'.

verses.text: 主必救我脫離一切邪惡的事，也必救我進入他天上的國。願榮耀歸給他，直到永永遠遠。阿們。

words.note: Used as a title for God or Jesus.
Expresses strong determination or certainty.
Expresses strong determination or certainty.
Often used in '天國' (Kingdom of Heaven).
Implies returning or attributing honor/glory.
Reduplication for emphasis, meaning perpetuity.
A Hebrew word adopted into many languages, meaning 'so be it'.

verses.text: 問候的話問候百基拉、亞居拉和阿尼色弗一家的人。
以拉都在哥林多住下了。特羅非摩病了，我就留他在米利都。

words.note: Indicates a completed action or change of state.
Indicates a change of state or completion of an action.

verses.text: 你要趕緊在冬天以前到我這裡來。友布羅、布田、利奴、革老底亞和眾弟兄都問候你。

words.note: Often used as a prefix to indicate a plural group.
Refers to fellow believers in a Christian context.

verses.text: 主與你同在。願恩惠與你們同在。

words.note: Refers to God or Jesus Christ in Christian scripture.
Common expression for God's presence with people.
Used to express a wish or desire.
A key theological term for God's unmerited favor.
Common expression for God's presence with people.
